column1: Funeral Services will be held on Tuesday 8:15 a.m. at Farone & Son Funeral Home and 9 a.m. in the Cathedral of the Immaculate Conception. Burial will follow in Woodlawn Cemetery. Calling hours will be held on Monday from 4 p.m. to 7 p.m. at the funeral home
column2: 1500 Park St. (Corner of Court St. and Park St.)
